snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday’s selections include a decline in investment in social media from venture capitalists, and a mathematical comparison of new phone...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday’s selections include a decline in investment in social media from venture capitalists, and a mathematical comparison of new phone plans from AT&T and T-Mobile.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Social Media Cooling, and Expensive Upgrades
